description: Verify that the Sign Up page loads correctly when accessing the /auth/signup URL
scenario: New user navigates to the signup page to create a CyberQuest account
expected_results: Display the complete signup page with multi-step form, cybersecurity theme, and proper initialization
procedure:
1. Open web browser
2. Navigate to http://localhost:5000/auth/signup
3. Verify page loads completely
4. Check page title displays 'Join CyberQuest'
5. Verify multi-step signup form is visible and properly styled
6. Check JavaScript components initialize correctly

description: Verify the mission header displays correctly with cybersecurity theme
scenario: User views the signup page header with gradient background and mission styling
expected_results: Display mission-themed header with proper styling and animated background elements
procedure:
1. Navigate to /auth/signup page
2. Verify gradient background from blue to purple (from-blue-50 via-indigo-100 to-purple-100)
3. Check animated background elements are present (green, blue, purple circles)
4. Verify header includes mission-themed content
5. Check dark mode compatibility with gradient adjustments
6. Verify maximum width constraint (max-w-2xl) centers form
7. Test background element animations and positioning

description: Verify the multi-step form structure and navigation system
scenario: User interacts with the 4-step signup process and navigation controls
expected_results: Display 4-step form with proper step indicators, navigation buttons, and step transitions
procedure:
1. Navigate to /auth/signup page
2. Verify 4 step indicators are displayed
3. Check current step (Step 1) is marked as active
4. Verify navigation buttons (Previous hidden, Next visible)
5. Check step indicators show proper states (active, completed, inactive)
6. Test step transition animations work correctly
7. Verify totalSteps constant is set to 4
8. Check currentStep initializes to 1

description: Verify Step 1 form fields for username and email input
scenario: User enters agent username and email credentials in Step 1
expected_results: Display username and email fields with proper validation and real-time feedback
procedure:
1. Navigate to /auth/signup page (Step 1 active by default)
2. Verify 'Agent Username' field is present with person-badge icon
3. Check 'Agent Email' field is present with envelope icon
4. Test username validation (3-30 characters, alphanumeric and underscores)
5. Verify email format validation
6. Check real-time summary updates as user types
7. Test input trimming and lowercase conversion
8. Verify field styling and focus effects

description: Verify Step 2 password creation with strength checking and validation
scenario: User creates secure password with real-time strength feedback
expected_results: Display password fields with strength meter, validation feedback, and confirmation matching
procedure:
1. Navigate to Step 2 of signup form
2. Verify 'Agent Password' field with key icon
3. Check 'Confirm Password' field is present
4. Verify password strength checker initializes with cybersecurity theme
5. Test real-time password strength meter updates
6. Check password validation rules (length, uppercase, lowercase, numbers, special chars)
7. Verify password confirmation matching validation
8. Test user input integration for strength checking
9. Check custom styling classes for strength meter

description: Verify Step 3 experience level selection with focus options
scenario: User selects cybersecurity experience level and learning focus
expected_results: Display experience level radio buttons with proper selection and summary updates
procedure:
1. Navigate to Step 3 of signup form
2. Verify experience level options are displayed (Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced, Expert)
3. Check radio button functionality and selection
4. Test summary updates when experience level is selected
5. Verify focus labels mapping works correctly
6. Check that only one option can be selected at a time
7. Test validation requires selection before proceeding
8. Verify styling consistency with cybersecurity theme

description: Verify Step 4 terms acceptance, hCaptcha, and account creation
scenario: User reviews summary, accepts terms, completes hCaptcha, and creates account
expected_results: Display summary, terms checkbox, hCaptcha widget, and create account button
procedure:
1. Navigate to Step 4 of signup form
2. Verify account summary displays entered information
3. Check terms and conditions checkbox is present
4. Verify hCaptcha widget displays when enabled
5. Test terms acceptance validation
6. Check hCaptcha validation integration
7. Verify submit button changes to 'Create Account'
8. Test final form submission functionality

description: Verify step-by-step navigation with validation at each step
scenario: User navigates through steps with proper validation and error handling
expected_results: Each step validates before allowing progression, with appropriate error messages
procedure:
1. Start at Step 1 and attempt to proceed without filling fields
2. Verify validation error messages appear
3. Fill valid data and proceed to Step 2
4. Test password validation before proceeding
5. Navigate to Step 3 and test experience level requirement
6. Proceed to Step 4 and test final validations
7. Test backward navigation preserves data
8. Verify form data is saved between steps

description: Verify password strength checker component functionality
scenario: User enters various passwords and observes strength feedback
expected_results: Real-time password strength analysis with meter, feedback, and user input consideration
procedure:
1. Navigate to Step 2 password creation
2. Enter weak password and verify low strength score
3. Check strength meter updates in real-time
4. Test password feedback messages
5. Enter strong password and verify high strength score
6. Test user input integration (username/email affect strength)
7. Verify custom cybersecurity theme styling
8. Check strength meter color coding and visual feedback

description: Verify password validation component with requirements checking
scenario: User enters password and sees validation requirements status
expected_results: Display password requirements with real-time validation status indicators
procedure:
1. Navigate to Step 2 password creation
2. Verify password validation requirements are displayed
3. Test minimum length requirement (8+ characters)
4. Check uppercase letter requirement validation
5. Verify lowercase letter requirement
6. Test number requirement validation
7. Check special character requirement
8. Verify password confirmation matching
9. Test custom styling classes (text-green-400 for valid, text-red-400 for invalid)

description: Verify real-time summary updates as user progresses through steps
scenario: User enters information and sees summary update in real-time
expected_results: Summary section updates immediately when form fields change
procedure:
1. Navigate to Step 1 and enter username
2. Verify summary-username updates immediately
3. Enter email and check summary-email updates
4. Navigate to Step 3 and select experience level
5. Verify summary-focus updates with correct label
6. Test that empty fields show '-' placeholder
7. Check summary persists across step navigation
8. Verify focus labels mapping works correctly

description: Verify form data is saved and persists across step navigation
scenario: User navigates back and forth between steps without losing data
expected_results: Form data is preserved when navigating between steps
procedure:
1. Fill out Step 1 with username and email
2. Navigate to Step 2 and enter password
3. Go back to Step 1 and verify data is preserved
4. Navigate forward to Step 2 and check password data
5. Continue to Step 3, select experience level
6. Navigate backward and verify all data persists
7. Test form data saving mechanism (saveCurrentStepData)
8. Verify formData object stores all step information

description: Verify successful account creation flow with email verification
scenario: User completes all steps and successfully creates account
expected_results: Account created successfully, redirect to email verification pending page
procedure:
1. Complete Step 1 with valid username and email
2. Complete Step 2 with strong password
3. Complete Step 3 with experience level selection
4. Complete Step 4 with terms acceptance and hCaptcha
5. Click 'Create Account' button
6. Verify loading state shows 'Creating Account...'
7. Check successful account creation in database
8. Verify redirect to email verification pending page
9. Check email verification token is created
10. Verify success notification is displayed

description: Verify comprehensive username validation and error handling
scenario: User enters various username formats and receives appropriate validation
expected_results: Proper username validation with specific error messages for different issues
procedure:
1. Navigate to Step 1 username field
2. Enter username less than 3 characters and test validation
3. Enter username with special characters (not allowed) and test
4. Enter username longer than 30 characters and test
5. Try existing username and verify 'Username already exists' error
6. Enter valid username and verify acceptance
7. Test real-time validation feedback
8. Verify server-side validation matches client-side

description: Verify email format validation and duplicate checking
scenario: User enters various email formats and existing emails
expected_results: Proper email validation with format checking and duplicate detection
procedure:
1. Navigate to Step 1 email field
2. Enter invalid email format (missing @) and test validation
3. Enter email with invalid domain and test
4. Try existing email address and verify 'Email already registered' error
5. Enter valid, unique email and verify acceptance
6. Test email format regex validation
7. Check case insensitive email handling
8. Verify server-side email validation

description: Verify password meets all security requirements with zxcvbn validation
scenario: User creates password that must meet complex security requirements
expected_results: Password validation uses zxcvbn library with user input consideration
procedure:
1. Navigate to Step 2 password creation
2. Enter password that matches username (should be rejected)
3. Try password with email prefix (should be rejected)
4. Enter common weak password and verify rejection
5. Create strong password meeting all requirements
6. Verify zxcvbn validation considers user inputs
7. Test password confirmation matching requirement
8. Check all security criteria are enforced

description: Verify hCaptcha integration and validation in Step 4
scenario: User completes hCaptcha verification before account creation
expected_results: hCaptcha widget displays and validates correctly when enabled
procedure:
1. Navigate to Step 4 with hCaptcha enabled
2. Verify hCaptcha widget loads correctly
3. Complete hCaptcha verification
4. Test form submission with valid hCaptcha
5. Try submitting without completing hCaptcha
6. Verify hCaptcha validation error message
7. Test hCaptcha integration with form validation
8. Check hCaptcha handler script loads correctly

description: Verify proper handling when database is disabled (Vercel environment)
scenario: User attempts signup in deployment environment with disabled database
expected_results: Display warning message about registration unavailability
procedure:
1. Set DISABLE_DATABASE config to True
2. Navigate to /auth/signup page
3. Complete all form steps
4. Submit form for account creation
5. Verify warning message 'User registration is not available in this deployment environment.'
6. Check form remains accessible but signup is blocked
7. Verify no database operations are attempted
8. Test user experience with clear messaging

description: Verify redirect behavior when user is already authenticated
scenario: Logged-in user tries to access signup page
expected_results: Automatic redirect to home page for authenticated users
procedure:
1. Login with existing account
2. Navigate to /auth/signup page while logged in
3. Verify automatic redirect to home page
4. Check redirect preserves any query parameters
5. Test redirect security (no open redirects)
6. Verify user experience is seamless
7. Check no signup form is displayed to logged-in users

description: Verify step indicator visual states and functionality
scenario: User observes step indicators as they progress through signup
expected_results: Step indicators show correct states: inactive, active, completed
procedure:

2. Verify Step 1 indicator is active (highlighted)
3. Check Steps 2-4 indicators are inactive
4. Complete Step 1 and move to Step 2
5. Verify Step 1 shows completed state (checkmark)
6. Check Step 2 shows active state
7. Continue through all steps verifying indicator states
8. Test step indicator visual styling and icons

description: Verify navigation button appearance and functionality across steps

procedure:

2. Check Next button shows 'Next' text with arrow icon
3. Navigate to intermediate steps and verify both buttons visible
4. Reach Step 4 and verify Next button becomes 'Create Account'
5. Check button icons change appropriately (next vs submit)
6. Test loading state when submitting (spinner animation)
7. Verify disabled states work correctly
8. Test button accessibility and keyboard navigation

description: Verify cyber-themed notification system for user feedback

expected_results: Notifications display with proper styling, timing, and cyber theme

4. Check general Exception handling for unexpected errors
5. Verify error messages are user-friendly
6. Test error recovery without losing form data
7. Check error logging for debugging purposes
8. Verify error states don't break form functionality

description: Verify CSRF token integration and protection

procedure:

2. View page source and verify csrf_token hidden field
3. Complete signup process and submit form
4. Verify CSRF token is included in POST request
5. Test form submission without CSRF token (should fail)
6. Check CSRF token validation in Flask-WTF
7. Verify security against CSRF attacks
8. Test CSRF token refresh on page reload
